name: Close'em Up
description:
Close’em Up! Newest Casual Puzzle Game You’ll Get Addicted to!

Your Latest Perfect Time Killer! Close’em Up is a Casual Puzzle Game, where you place tiles in order to come up with different unique combinations to make a match! Form a Big Square, or a Small One! Make a Big “L” Shape or just be Creative the way YOU WANT, AS LONG AS YOU CLOSE’EM UP!

Features:

• The BIGGER your SHAPE is, the MORE SCORE you get!
• A LOT OF COMBINATIONS to make! It’s all up to your CREATIVITY!
• FULL of POWERUPS you can get on the way to SUCCESS!
• COMPETE with people ALL AROUND THE WORLD, on the LEADERBOARD!
• PLAY it ONLINE and OFFLINE!
• MORE to come!
